verses.verse: My heart <S%H3820><s%> overflows <S%H7370><s%> with a noble <S%H2896><s%> theme. <S%H1697><s%> I recite <S%H559><s%> my verses <S%H4639><s%> for the king. <S%H4428><s%> My tongue <S%H3956><s%> is like the pen <S%H5842><s%> of a skillful <S%H4106><s%> writer. <S%H5608><s%>

You are the most excellent <S%H3302><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%> Grace <S%H2580><s%> has anointed <S%H3332><s%> your lips, <S%H8193><s%> therefore God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Strap <S%H2296><s%> your sword <S%H2719><s%> on your thigh, <S%H3409><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> one: <S%H1935><s%> your splendor and your majesty. <S%H1926><s%>

In your majesty <S%H1926><s%> ride <S%H7392><s%> on victoriously <S%H6743><s%> on behalf <S%H1697><s%> of truth, <S%H571><s%> humility, <S%H6037><s%> and righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> Let your right hand <S%H3225><s%> display <S%H3384><s%> awesome deeds. <S%H3372><s%>
Your arrows <S%H2671><s%> are sharp. <S%H8150><s%> The nations <S%H5971><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> under you, <S%H3820><s%> with arrows in the heart of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Your throne, <S%H3678><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> is forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%> A scepter <S%H7626><s%> of equity <S%H4334><s%> is the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of your kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>

You have loved <S%H157><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and hated <S%H8130><s%> wickedness. <S%H7562><s%> Therefore God, <S%H430><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> has anointed <S%H4886><s%> you with the oil <S%H8081><s%> of gladness <S%H8342><s%> above your fellows. <S%H2270><s%>

All your garments <S%H899><s%> smell like myrrh, <S%H4753><s%> aloes, <S%H174><s%> and cassia. <S%H7102><s%> Out of ivory <S%H8127><s%> palaces <S%H1964><s%> stringed <S%H4482><s%> instruments have made you glad. <S%H8055><s%>

Kings <S%H4428><s%>' daughters <S%H1323><s%> are among your honorable women. <S%H3368><s%> At your right hand <S%H3225><s%> the queen <S%H7694><s%> stands <S%H5324><s%> in gold <S%H3800><s%> of Ophir. <S%H211><s%>

Listen, <S%H8085><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> consider, <S%H7200><s%> and turn <S%H5186><s%> your ear. <S%H241><s%> Forget <S%H7911><s%> your own people, <S%H5971><s%> and also your father <S%H1><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>
So the king <S%H4428><s%> will desire <S%H183><s%> your beauty, <S%H3308><s%> honor <S%H7812><s%> him, <S%H113><s%> for he is your lord.
The daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> comes with a gift. <S%H4503><s%> The rich <S%H6223><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> entreat <S%H2470><s%> your favor. <S%H6440><s%>
The <S%H4428><s%> princess <S%H1323><s%> inside <S%H6441><s%> is all glorious. <S%H3520><s%> Her clothing <S%H3830><s%> is interwoven <S%H4865><s%> with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

She shall be led <S%H2986><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> in embroidered work. <S%H7553><s%> The virgins, <S%H1330><s%> her companions <S%H7464><s%> who follow <S%H310><s%> her, <S%H935><s%> shall be brought to you.
With gladness <S%H8057><s%> and rejoicing <S%H1524><s%> they shall be led. <S%H2986><s%> They shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the king <S%H4428><s%>'s palace. <S%H1964><s%>
Your sons <S%H1121><s%> will take the place of your fathers. <S%H1><s%> You shall make <S%H7896><s%> them princes <S%H8269><s%> in all the earth. <S%H776><s%>

I will make your name <S%H8034><s%> to be remembered <S%H2142><s%> in all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> Therefore the peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall give you thanks <S%H3034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%>
